Class DirectedGraphMatrix<T>

  • java.lang.Object

    T -

    Graph<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirectedWeightedGraphMatrix

    public class DirectedGraphMatrix<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Graph<T>
    Implementation with adj matrix INVARIANT : IDs of nodes are their position in V V.size() = E.getSize();
    Author:
    rossi
